preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 40 g of boron powder (B) and place in a mixing bowl.  
 2. Add 100 g of cobalt powder (Co) to the bowl.  
 3. Add 30 g of magnesium (Mg) to the mixture.  
 4. Incorporate 20 g of silicon (Si) into the blend.  
 5. Finally, add 10 g of zinc (Zn).  
 6. Use a ceramic spatula to thoroughly mix all the ingredients until homogeneous.
